name: Healthy & Delicious: White Peach Bellini
description: Note: On Mondays, Kristen Swensson of Cheap, Healthy, Good swings by these parts to share healthy and delicious recipes with us. Take it away, Kristen! When you're trying to lose weight or maintain a weight loss, one of the trickiest...
recipeIngredient: 2 medium-size very ripe unpeeled white peaches, halved, pitted

recipeInstructions.text: Puree peaches, lemon juice, and syrup in blender. Taste; add more syrup or lemon juice, if desired. Strain mixture through a fine mesh sieve. Pour 2 tablespoons strained puree into each of 6 Champagne flutes. Fill with Prosecco.
